    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AI
    Represents the computer-controlled opponent in the game.
    Board
    Represents the game board for the Battleship game.
    DoubleShootException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts to shoot a cell on the opponent's board that has already been targeted.
    GameController
    Controller class for managing the core gameplay logic and visual components of the Battleship game.
    GameStage
    Represents the main game window (stage) for the Battleship game.
    GameState
    Represents the saved state of the game, used for serialization and persistence.
    IPlaneTextFileHandler
    Interface that defines the contract for reading from and writing to plain text files.
    IPlayer
    Represents a generic player in the game.
    ISerializableFileHandler
    Defines the contract for serializing and deserializing objects to and from files using Java's standard serialization mechanism.
    Main
    Main class that serves as the entry point of the Battleship game application.
    MusicPlayer
    Handles audio playback for background music using JavaFX's MediaPlayer.
    PlaneTextFileHandler
    Implements the IPlaneTextFileHandler interface to provide basic functionality for reading from and writing to plain text files.
    Player
    Represents a human player in the game.
    PlayerAdapter
    An abstract adapter class for the IPlayer interface.
    SerializableFileHandler
    Implements the ISerializableFileHandler interface to provide basic functionality for serializing and deserializing Java objects to and from files using ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream.
    Ship
    This class represents a ship in the game.
    Ship.Coordinate
    Inner static class that represents a coordinate on the board.
    UIVisualHelper
    Utility class providing visual enhancements and UI feedback mechanisms for the Battleship game.
    VisualException
    Exception thrown when a visual-related error occurs in the application.
    WelcomeController
    Controller class for handling the Welcome Stage of the application.
    WelcomeStage
    The WelcomeStage class represents the initial stage (window) of the application, displaying the welcome screen for the user to start or continue a game.
